alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 1:11PM PST until January 17 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations from 1 PM to 10 PM between 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Plain, Stehekin, Leavenworth, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to decrease or come to an end by early this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
